content: While I live I will praise the ;
I will sing praises to my God as long as I live.
In mortal man, in whom there is no salvation (help).
When his spirit leaves him, he returns to the earth;
In that very day his thoughts  plans perish.
How blessed  graciously favored is he whose help is the God of Jacob (Israel),
Whose hope is in the  his God,
The sea, and all that is in them,
Who keeps truth  is faithful forever,
Who executes justice for the oppressed,
Who gives food to the hungry.
